item.title: Maybe We Should Go Easy on Uncle Bob
item.description: Holy crap! In case you missed it, Uncle Bob got excoriated on Twitter earlier this week for a comment he made about the media’s coverage of the separation of immigrant children from their parents. Here’s the comment: The political rhetoric this past week has been unacceptable. Cries of Nazi-ism and reference to Japanese internment camps were irresponsible and beyond the pale. Shame on the media outlets who promoted this, and those who repeated it.
